title: Are women using wine to cope with the patriarchy?
itunes:title: Are women using wine to cope with the patriarchy?
description:
Many people give up drinking in January. Here’s what boozing means for women and feminism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
